1.1 Use of existing resources in places that are non- save locations 1.2 Use of existing resources in places that are to be saved 1.3 Conservation of facilities and resources 1.4 Control of conservation problems 2.1 Identification and signage 2.2 Definition and adaptation of places to store resources. 2.3 Order of the resources 2.4 Layout 3.1 Level of cleaning (dirt caused by people) 3.2 Level of cleaning (dirt caused by the process or the external spaces) 3.3 Cleaning standard 3.4 Garbage baskets And other discart collectors 4.1. In several places, several anomalies were found in the use of resources (excessive proportions, improvisations, unnecessary resources, lack or waste) In several places, some anomalies were found in the use of resources (excessive proportions, improvisations, unnecessary resources, lack or waste).

"every resources on floors, tables and other open space are used properly (no excess, improvisations, unnecessary resources, lack or waste). There may be insignificant irregularities."

"Every resources in closets, drawers and other enclosed spaces are shared and used correctly (no excess, improvisations, unnecessary resources, lack or waste). There may be insignificant irregularities.
There are widespread conservation problems and some compromise the safety or functionality of facilities and resources, according to environmental characteristics. There are conservation problems in some facilities or resource. some compromises the safety or functionality, according to environmental characteristics. There are widespread conservation problems but not compromise the safety or functionality of facilities and resources, according to environmental characteristics. There are conservation problems in some facilities or resource but not compromises the safety or functionality, according to environmental characteristics. All facilities and resources are in good condition. There may be insignificant irregularities for the characteristics of the environment.
There is no formal justification for most conservation problems encountered There is no formal justification for some conservation problems, including for some that compromises the safety or functionality of facilities and resources, according to environmental characteristics. There is no formal justification for some conservation problems, but it does not compromises the safety or functionality of facilities and resources, according to environmental characteristics. There is no formal justification for one conservation problem, but it does not compromis the safety or functionality of facilities and resources, according to environmental characteristics. There is a formal justification for all conservation problems and none of them compromise the safety or functionality of facilities and resources. There may be insignificant irregularities for the characteristics of the environment.
In several places there are deficiencies of identification and signaling. There is no plan for the correction of most of the deficiences In several places there are deficiencies of identification and signaling. There is no plan for the correction some of them. In some places there are deficiencies of identification and signaling. There is no plan for the correction some of them. In some places there are deficiencies of identification and signaling. There is a plan for the correction of them In all places there are identifications and signage that facilitate the location and avoid the loss of time and risks. There may be insignificant irregularities for the characteristics of the environment.
In several places there are several resources without defined and suitable places for their storage (format, dimensions, type of material, etc.). In several places there are some resources without defined and suitable places for their storage (format, dimensions, type of material, etc.). In some places there are several resources without defined and suitable places for their storage (format, dimensions, type of material, etc.). In some places there are some resources without defined and suitable places for their storage (format, dimensions, type of material, etc.). There are defined and suitable places for all the resources used (format, dimensions, type of material, etc.). There may be insignificant irregularities for the characteristics of the environment.
In several places were found several resources disordered, making access difficult (there are useful resources outside the places of store, mixture, difficulty of visual identification or risk problems). In several places were found some resources disordered, making access difficult (there are useful resources outside the places of store, mixture, difficulty of visual identification or risk problems). In some places were found several resources disordered, making access difficult (there are useful resources outside the places of store, mixture, difficulty of visual identification or risk problems). In some places were found some resources disordered, making access difficult (there are useful resources outside the places of store, mixture, difficulty of visual identification or risk problems). All resources are classified and organized (there are no resources available outside of storage places, mixed, difficulty of visual location or risk problems).There may be insignificant irregularities for the characteristics of the environment.
In several places there are design deficiencies that promote fatigue, risks and lost time (planned distribution of productive and / or support resources, hampering circulation and access, incompatible space or volume, etc.). There is no plan for the correction of the majority. In several places there are design deficiencies that promote fatigue, risks and lost time (planned distribution of productive and / or support resources, hampering circulation and access, incompatible space or volume, etc.). There is no plan for the correction some of them. In some places there are design deficiencies that promote fatigue, risks and lost time (planned distribution of productive and / or support resources, hampering circulation and access, incompatible space or volume, etc.). There is no plan for the correction some of them. In some places there are design deficiencies that promote fatigue, risks and lost time (planned distribution of productive and / or support resources, hampering circulation and access, incompatible space or volume, etc.). There is a plan for the correction of them The location of all productive and support resources is appropriate, facilitates movement and / or access, avoiding risks, fatigue and loss of time. It may have insignificant irregularities for the characteristics of the environment.
In several places there is dirt, all caused by the people of the area In several places there is dirt, some provoked by the people of the area or by non compliance with the cleaning routine. In some places there is dirt, some provoked by the people of the area or by non compliance with the cleaning routine. In some places there is dirt clearly provoked by people from other areas or simply by non compliance with the cleaning routine. There is no dirt caused by people or lack of cleaning routine. There may be insignificant irregularities for the characteristics of the environment.
In several places there are source of dirt or accumulation of dirt of long time, generating risks of accidents and that are not contained. In some places there are source of dirt or accumulation of dirt of long time, generating risks of accidents and that are not contained. The sources of dirt or accumulation of dirt of long time, is not generating risks of accidents. There is no defined deadline for the removal of sources of dirt. The sources of dirt or accumulation of dirt of long time, is not generating risks of accidents. There is defined deadline for the removal of sources of dirt. Sources of dirt (machinery, equipment, handling of product) or dirt accumulated over time do not create a risk of accidents and the extinction of their source was considered technically and financially unviable by the company. There may be insignificant irregularities for the characteristics of the environment.
There is no defined frequency and / or suitable for cleaning any type of dirt (generated by processes, handing of product, weather, animals, trees, transport, etc.). There is no defined frequency and / or suitable for cleaning several type of dirt (generated by processes, handing of product, weather, animals, trees, transport, etc.). There is no defined frequency and / or suitable for cleaning some type of dirt (generated by processes, handing of product, weather, animals, trees, transport, etc.). There is a defined frequency and suitable for cleaning all type of dirt (generated by processes, handing of product, weather, animals, trees, transport, etc.).The systematic does not include, in writing, all places of difficult access. There is a defined frequency and suitable for cleaning all type of dirt (generated by processes, handing of product, weather, animals, trees, transport, etc.). The routine includes, all the places of difficult access. In several places there are several deficiencies in waste baskets, and other collectors (quantity, identification, conservation, hygiene, size, cleaning frequency, identification, signaling, practice of selective collection, etc.). In several places there are some deficiencies in waste baskets, and other collectors (quantity, identification, conservation, hygiene, size, cleaning frequency, identification, signaling, practice of selective collection, etc.). In some places there are several deficiencies in waste baskets, and other collectors (quantity, identification, conservation, hygiene, size, cleaning frequency, identification, signaling, practice of selective collection, etc.). In some places there are some deficiencies in waste baskets, and other collectors (quantity, identification, conservation, hygiene, size, cleaning frequency, identification, signaling, practice of selective collection, etc.). All waste baskets, and other collectors are suitable (quantity, identification, conservation, hygiene, size, cleaning frequency, identification, signaling, practice of selective collection, etc.). There may be insignificant irregularities for the characteristics of the environment. There are only a few rules on identifications and signage. Most do not obey any rules. There are some rules on identifications and signage. Most do not obey any standard.
In all places there are identifications and signage. There may be some insignificant irregularity for the characteristics of the environment. Some paintings, identifications and signage do not obey a standard.
In all places there are identifications and signage. There may be some insignificant irregularity for the characteristics of the environment. Few paintings, identifications and signage do not obey a standard.
In all places there are identifications and signage. There may be an insignificant irregularity for the characteristics of the environment. All paintings, identifications and signage are standardized.
There are some ergonomic problems and / or some hygiene problems in the work area, but there is no plan to solve it
There are some ergonomic problem and / or hygiene problem in the work area, but there is no study to solve them.
There are some ergonomic problem and / or hygiene problem in the work area and there is study to solve them.
There are some ergonomic problem and / or hygiene problem in the work area and there are concrete actions to solve it.
There is no ergonomic or hygiene problem in the work area It may have insignificant irregularities for the characteristics of the environment.
There is no system for maintenance of 5S. The practice is random.
There is some system for maintenance to 5S, but it does not guarantee continuous improvement (evaluations, action plans, division of responsibilities, disclosure of rules, meetings, recognition, disclosure of results, etc.)
There is a system for continuous improvement of 5S, but there is a deficiency in several aspects (evaluations, action plans, division of responsibilities, disclosure of rules, meetings, recognition, disclosure of results, etc.)
There is a system for continuous improvement of 5S, but there is a deficiency in some aspects (evaluations, action plans, division of responsibilities, disclosure of rules, meetings, recognition, disclosure of results, etc.)
There is an efficient system for the continuous improvement of 5S (evaluations, action plans, division of responsibilities, disclosure of rules, meetings, recognition, disclosure of results, etc.)
There is no defined criteria for the electronic storage of documents.
The possible definition for the electronic storage of documents is not extended for all types (Net, CPU, E-mail).
There is no defined protocol for the storage of electronic documents. (Net, CPU, E-mail). Some folders and shared files do not uniform denomination.
There is defined for the storage of electronic documents (Net, CPU, E-mail). There is no clear separation beetwen a personal and profesional files.
There is a definition for keeping all types of electronic documents (network, CPU, E-mail). All shared files and folders have uniform names. There is a general separation beetwen of personal and profesional files. There may be insignificant irregularities for the characteristics of the environment.
Some of the people observed / interviewed, practice 5S in the day to day without need of monitoring or order

"All of people observed / interviewed, practice 5S in the day to day without need of monitoring or order Even in other areas that they frequent or work. "
some of the people observed / interviewed comply with norms, rules and procedures (safety, environment, quality, etc.), without the need for monitoring or order

"Most people observed / interviewed have problems, such as: * Inappropriate behavior in their area or in the area of others * Inadequate material displayed in the workplace (adhesives, obscene photos, graffiti, etc.) * Inadequate use of collective spaces (water, energy, bathroom, copier, coffee, etc.). * Inadequate smoking practice * Lack of team spirit * Lack of initiative for 5S, etc.."
"Several people observed / interviewed have problems, such as: * Inappropriate behavior in their area or in the area of others * Inadequate material displayed in the workplace (adhesives, obscene photos, graffiti, etc.) * Inadequate use of collective spaces (water, energy, bathroom, copier, coffee, etc.). * Inadequate smoking practice * Lack of team spirit * Lack of initiative for 5S, etc.."
"Some people observed / interviewed have problems, such as: * Inappropriate behavior in their area or in the area of others * Inadequate material displayed in the workplace (adhesives, obscene photos, graffiti, etc.) * Inadequate use of collective spaces (water, energy, bathroom, copier, coffee, etc.). * Inadequate smoking practice * Lack of team spirit * Lack of initiative for 5S, etc.."
"Few people observed / interviewed have problems, such as: * Inappropriate behavior in their area or in the area of others * Inadequate material displayed in the workplace (adhesives, obscene photos, graffiti, etc.) * Inadequate use of collective spaces (water, energy, bathroom, copier, coffee, etc.). * Inadequate smoking practice * Lack of team spirit * Lack of initiative for 5S, etc.."
"Non of the people observed / interviewed have problems, such as: * Inappropriate behavior in their area or in the area of others * Inadequate material displayed in the workplace (adhesives, obscene photos, graffiti, etc.) * Inadequate use of collective spaces (water, energy, bathroom, copier, coffee, etc.). * Inadequate smoking practice * Lack of team spirit * Lack of initiative for 5S, etc.."
